review: He was friendly yet professional. Understood then concern and the medicine he gave is working like magic. I am feeling better just after having the first dose.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: doctor is very friendly, calm, approachable and explained so very nicely as to what needs to be followed. The nurse and the staff are very friendly and helpful. They take the blood samples right there and provide the report within next morning. They provide a very detailed prescription both in hard and soft copy which I really liked. Also they share the blood reports through WhatsApp. They also do follow-up and ask about the updates till the patient is cured. The consultation charges are pocket friendly and I would definitely recommend Clinikk to anyone and it would be my go to place for any of my future needs.
Good doctor , nice experience , proper explanation of condition, explained about recovery procedure
